title: Day 1
content: DREAMING ABOUT A DRASTIC NEW HAIRSTYLE MAY MEAN THAT YOU WISH TO TAKE A NEW APPROACH WITH WAY PEOPLE VIEW YOU

title: Day 2
content: Treat yourself to a massage

title: Day 3
content: Thinly slice a courgette and spread the slices out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle a tablespoon of oil on top and sprinkle garlic powder, cumin, paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Bake for an hour and a half at 100 degrees celsius

title: Day 4
content: Try your hand at flower arranging. Pick or buy some flowers in different colours, shapes and textures that catch your eye and arrange them in a vase. You can add dried flowers, branches or even glitter!

title: Day 5
content: Treat yourself to a massage

title: Day 10
content: Set sane parameters. Instead of banning yourself from online streaming, you could opt to cut out solo binge-watching and organise a movie night with friends once a week

content: Have a video chat date with a friend you haven't seen in a while

title: Day 13
content: As part of an ethical farming policy, the cows that produce the milk for Ben & Jerry's ice cream receive regular massages

title: Day 14
content: You answer me but I have asked you nothing What am I?
